snippet.title: Drag Racer USA (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Feel all 600+ BHP shake through your body as the engine roars at a touch of the throttle. Get your hands on the wheel and gear shifter firmly, eyes locked on the lights. With extreme concentration watch, the lights go from red to orange to green, dump the clutch and launch your car to perfection.
Hear and feel the tires screech as all of your car's power rushes through them leaving behind nothing but a big cloud of burnt rubber, while you struggle to keep the car going where you want it to.
Keep your eye on the finish line, this is definitely the game where you get to master your tunnel vision as you become a real Drag Racer.
